data.title: Current Weather Forecasts, Live Radar Maps & News
data.meta_description: Want to know what the weather is now? Check out our current live radar and weather forecasts for Llano, Texas to help plan your day
data.text:
For more than 20 years Earth Networks has operated the worldâ€™s largest and most comprehensive weather observation, lightning detection, and climate networks.

We are now leveraging our big data smarts to deliver on the promise of IoT. By integrating our hyper-local weather data with Smart Home connected devices we are delievering predictive energy efficiency insight to homeowners and Utility companies.
